EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan Phase I: Non-Google New Hires
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your WEX Learning Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get a head start on your Learning Journey!
As you embark on your new journey with WEX, we challenge you to take advantage of all the learning resources provided, including this Learning Plan.
The Global Training Team has developed self-directed and self-paced Learning Plans to jump start your success in your new role.
Your Phase I Learning Plan can be found here: https://wexinc.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/700000009EOI/a/0g0000005hDB/aLRAlW3gEjgtR7E0L3L5LuDxVAZjjwURRy8k.Tojbxk
Within the next two weeks, complete the Learning Plan Knowledge Check (https://wex.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_3EO1QBPhVZm5Gjr) to ensure your comprehension of the content.
Thank You, {!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
